collaboration:
Sections~\ref{sec:connecting}, \ref{subsec:terminology}, \ref{sec:gettingstarted}, \ref{subsec:typesofpokerhands}, and~\ref{subsec:studythecode}: In addition to the professor and the TAs, you may freely seek help on these sections from other students.

    Sections~\ref{sec:completingcard} and~\ref{subsec:completepoker}: These sections are individual-effort only.
    You may discuss concepts and syntax with other students, but you may discuss solutions only with the professor and the TAs.
    Sharing code with or copying code from another student or the internet is prohibited.
